planets.name: Mercury
planets.description: Mercury is the closest planet to the Sun and has a very thin atmosphere.

planets.name: Venus
planets.description: Venus is similar in size to Earth but has a thick atmosphere of carbon dioxide and sulfuric acid clouds.

planets.name: Earth
planets.description: Earth is the only known planet to support life, with vast oceans and diverse ecosystems.

planets.name: Moon
planets.description: The Moon is Earth's only natural satellite and is the fifth largest moon in the solar system.

planets.name: Mars
planets.description: Mars is known for its red color due to iron oxide on its surface and has the largest volcano in the solar system.

planets.name: Jupiter
planets.description: Jupiter is the largest planet in the solar system, known for its Great Red Spot and many moons.

planets.name: Saturn
planets.description: Saturn is famous for its stunning rings made of ice and rock particles.

planets.name: Uranus
planets.description: Uranus has a unique tilt and is known for its blue-green color due to methane in its atmosphere.

planets.name: Neptune
planets.description: Neptune is the farthest planet from the Sun and is known for its deep blue color and strong winds.
